com.nokia.places.media.request

Interface ReviewPageRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Request

    public interface ReviewPageRequest
extends Request
    This interface defines a request which returns a paginated list of user reviews.

    The following query retrieves a set of reviews associated with a particular Place
         ReviewPageRequest.getReviews(place.getId())

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.nokia.places.request.Request

        DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_RESULTS, DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_MEDIA

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReviewPage getReviews(java.lang.String placeId)
      This method makes a request for a list of paginated user reviews of a single Place.
      void getReviews(java.lang.String placeId, ReviewPageRequestListener listener)
      This method makes a request for a list of paginated professional reviews of a single Place.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.nokia.places.request.Request

        cancelRequest

    • Method Detail

      • getReviews

        ReviewPage getReviews(java.lang.String placeId)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             ServiceError
        This method makes a request for a list of paginated user reviews of a single Place. The call to RESTful Places service is made synchronously, and therefore blocks further operations until the request is complete.
        Parameters:
        placeId - the Id of the Place obtain reviews for
        Returns:
        A paginated list of user reviews
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on I/O errors
        ServiceError - on service errors

      • getReviews

        void getReviews(java.lang.String placeId,
              ReviewPageRequestListener listener)
        This method makes a request for a list of paginated professional reviews of a single Place. The call to RESTful Places service is made asynchronously, and therefore does not block.
        Parameters:
        placeId - the Id of the Place obtain reviews for
        listener - a pair of callback functions, one of which shall be called once the request has completed. The listener contains either the result of the request or the error should one occur.
